name: Cozy Baking
description:
Cozy Baking is a cooking simulator without the stress and struggle of traditional cooking games. In Cozy Baking, the player follows recipes from their beloved grandma's cookbook to create delicious baked goods. The player uses WASD to move around the comforting kitchen and interacts with objects and menus using their mouse.

This game was created for the Winter Melon Game Jam 2022. The game is currently unfinished, but we wanted to upload anyways to show our progress.
